data.name: Help the Ant
data.description:
`Tick` the legendary warrior ant is back from the war but is in critical condition and there is a urgent need for medical attention.He is currently in a cubile shaped hole. Currently the legendary `Tick` is in bottom corner and the [A.A.H] (Army Ant Hospital) is located diagonally opposite and upward. Something like this ...

* ****NOTE**** * War was ferocious, it had got `Tick's` wings cut so it can't fly. * Situation is very critical so we cann't risk to loose the legend that's why we have called another legend (`YOU`) to save the time by calculating the shortest distance He will need to cover. * INPUT * `length`, `breadth` and `height` of the cubicle. ````Example: l = 1; b = 2; h = 3; ```` * OUTPUT * `shortest distance` he has to cover. * ```` Answer (to above question) : 4.2426 ```` * Hint * ants can walk on walls ****Vote, Rank and Comment :)****
